article_title: Caddo Street Grill closing its doors
article_text:
Cleburne, TX (76033)

Today

Thunderstorms - some may contain locally heavy rain, especially during the morning hours. A few storms may be severe. High around 85F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch..

Tonight

Isolated thunderstorms during the evening. Mostly cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low around 70F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

article_metadata.author: From staff reports

og.description: A popular restaurant in Cleburne is closing its doors for good.
